label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_006
content:
## 2026-01-08 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS 21050 req | p50: 19.8ms p95: 49.5ms p99: N/A | err: 2.18% (459 errors) | success: 97.82%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS 205 req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 3.4% (7 errors) | success: 96.6%
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /health-check: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /change-request: REQUESTS 3 req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /cache-status: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 41% | Mem 65% | Disk 73% | Conns: N/A | Net: 90/122 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 27% | Mem 52% | Disk 55% | Conns: N/A | Net: 66/84 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 63% | Mem 74% | Disk 48% | Conns: N/A | Net: 120/150 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 47% | Mem 78% | Disk 60% | Conns: N/A | Net: 19/23 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-axfr: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-ixfr: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-signing: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-queries: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 87.0% | Bandwidth: 0.7 Gbps | Origin requests: 21050

### Alerts
- [WARNING] TSIG verification warning on bind nodes: NTP offset up to 8ms
- [INFO] Cloud edge site added in region expansion
- [INFO] DNS change logs missed due to storage rotation; backfilled from cloud provider audit export
- [WARNING] SOA serial mismatch on 2 zones after dynamic updates
- [INFO] Time sync resynced; alerts cleared

### Deployments & Changes
- Added new cloud edge site in region expansion; validated authoritative reachability and response codes before/after
- Forced IXFR from master for 2 zones with SOA serial mismatch; confirmed parity
- Backfilled DNS change logs from cloud provider audit export after missed hour

### Events
- Added new cloud edge site in region expansion; validated authoritative reachability and compared response codes before/after
- Noted brief NTP drift on bind nodes (offset up to 8ms) causing sporadic TSIG verification warnings; resynced time and cleared alerts
- Audit pipeline missed one hour of DNS change logs due to storage rotation misconfig; backfilled from cloud provider audit export
- SOA serial mismatch seen on 2 zones after dynamic updates; forced immediate IXFR from master and confirmed parity

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: A. Johnson. 3 pages. 6 tickets. Status: Stable after time sync and audit backfill; watching NTP and TSIG logs
